welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Concorezzo, a charming town known for its beautiful architecture and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our rich culture, delicious cuisine, and vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free for 1 hour, then requires payment for extended use.
